example.eg: The carbon matter combines with oxygen.
example.egtrans: 碳物质可以与氧气结合。

example.eg: The paper is made of fibrous matter, either pulp or textile.
example.egtrans: 纸是由纤维材料制成的，或是纸浆，或是织物。

example.eg: Congress needs to deal with the matter of illegal immigration soon.
example.egtrans: 国会需要尽快处理非法移民的问题。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 问题, 有争议的问题

example.eg: I really don't want to talk about that matter at the moment.
example.egtrans: 现在我实在不想谈那件事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事情, 课题, 讨论中的话题

example.eg: I really don't want to get involved in this unfortunate matter.
example.egtrans: 我真的不想牵扯到这件麻烦事里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事态, 问题, 状况

example.eg: What's the matter?  Do you need some help?
example.egtrans: 出了什么事，你需要帮助吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 困扰的事, 麻烦的事, 困难

example.eg: What's the matter with Julie? She's been crying all morning.
example.egtrans: 朱莉怎么了？她一早上都哭个没完。

example.eg: I'm not sure what the matter is but my laptop won't connect to the internet.
example.egtrans: 我的笔记本电脑连不上网，不知道怎么回事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 问题, 麻烦, 故障

example.eg: What's the matter with your suitcase?  Is the handle broken?
example.egtrans: 你的箱子有什么问题吗？是不是提手坏了？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 困难, 麻烦, 问题

example.eg: If you want to impress an employer, qualifications matter.
example.egtrans: 要想给雇主留下深刻印象，你的资历很重要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很重要, 具有重要性

example.eg: I love Paul, and his happiness matters to me.
example.egtrans: 天气晴不晴都没有影响，我还是想去沙滩。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有影响, 有重要性, 在乎

example.eg: Fashion is a matter of opinion.
They've been dating for 5 years, so it's only a matter of time before he proposes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 时间问题, 早晚的事, 迟早的事
作为理所当然的事, 自然地

example.eg: I'm not ignoring your brother; as a matter of fact, I invited him for dinner tonight.
example.egtrans: 我不是在无视你弟弟，事实上，我还邀请他来吃今晚的晚餐。

example.eg: Impotence is a delicate issue which most men find difficult to discuss.
example.egtrans: 阳痿是一个非常敏感的问题，许多男人都很难启齿。

example.eg: "I didn't have time to call Peter." "Doesn't matter. I'll probably see him this evening anyway."
"I forget to buy the milk." "It doesn't matter. I'll stop by the supermarket on the way back from work."

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实际情况, 事实真相

dsense.name: for that matter
dsense.guideword: (intensifier: what is more) (强调，增强语气)

example.eg: I know she doesn't like his music - for that matter, neither do I.
example.egtrans: 我知道她不喜欢他的音乐，再说，我也不喜欢。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 而且，再说，就那件事而论

example.eg: The separator removes water, clay, and other inorganic matter from the oil.

dsense.name: it does not matter, it doesn't matter

example.eg: It doesn't matter what you say; I'm still going to do what I want.
example.egtrans: 你说什么都不重要。我仍会去做我想做的事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 这不重要, 这无关紧要

example.eg: All living matter contains amino acids.
It matters little whether you come with me or not, I'm going anyway.
The meningitis outbreak is a matter of concern for health officials.
We're not dealing with matters of fact here, only wild opinions.

dsense.name: matter of importance, matter of great importance

example.eg: I can't play with you now; I have matters of importance to deal with.  I need to speak to the President now, it is a matter of great importance!
Roger mentioned that he had no religion, and that it was a matter of indifference to him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不在乎的事, 漠不关心的事

example.eg: The interpretation of a written contract is a matter of law to be determined by the court.

dsense.name: a matter of life and death, a matter of life or death, a life-or-death matter

example.eg: Getting out of a burning house fast is a matter of life and death.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生死攸关的问题, 紧要问题

example.eg: You must tell your mother that you will not be home in time, it's a matter of necessity.
James spoke about what he had seen in a matter-of-fact manner.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 实事求是的, 实际的
实事求是地，直截了当，讲求实际地

example.eg: I was upset, but my mother told me not to get so worked up over a minor matter.
He lets his wife handle all the money matters, like paying the mortgage and the bills.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 金钱方面的问题, 金钱问题, 财务问题

dsense.name: no laughing matter, not a laughing matter

example.eg: Slipping on the ice is no laughing matter; you could break your neck.

dsense.name: no matter
dsense.guideword: informal (it is not important) (非正式用语)

example.eg: The concert's sold out? No matter. We'll go to the movies instead.
example.egtrans: 音乐会的票卖光了？不要紧，我们改去看电影。

example.eg: You can cancel your appointment at any time, no matter the reason.
example.egtrans: 我可以随时以任何理由取消预约。

example.eg: No matter how you go, you can't get there in less than an hour.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不管怎样, 无论如何

example.eg: She's determined to become famous, no matter how!
She resists any change, no matter how small.
We need to get that money, no matter what!
Jason is always cheerful, no matter what life hands him.
You can always phone me, no matter when.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论何时, 随便什么时候

example.eg: No matter when I go, there always seems to be a long queue.
No matter where I go, I always carry a sketchbook and pen with me.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论在哪里, 不管到哪里

example.eg: No matter which lighter you buy, they all burn gas.  No matter which route we take, we will still be late.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论哪个, 无论哪些

example.eg: No matter who says that the sky is green, they are still wrong.
It does not matter if you make a typing mistake; just back up and fix it.
It doesn't matter to me.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…来说不重要, 于…无关紧要

example.eg: I recycle organic matter to make garden compost.

dsense.name: particulate matter
dsense.guideword: uncountable (particles in air) (悬浮在气体中)

example.eg: Stop prevaricating and get to the quick of the matter.
The subject matter of today's lecture is water pollution.
example.egtrans: 今天讲座的主题是水污染。

example.eg: This painter chooses unconventional subject matter, such as litter on the sidewalk.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现实, 事实，事情的真相

example.eg: Some people get very upset over the most trivial matters.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 区区小事, 芝麻大的事, 芝麻大的事

example.eg: So you're earning more than me – what does it matter?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出什么事了？, 怎么了？
